events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn’t fit and I want to request a refund. Please advise on the next steps.
The customer issue was classified under Refund based on keywords related to money back and return.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 587423, and the jacket is too small for me. I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thanks for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label via email. Once the jacket is received, we will issue your refund within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help with making the refund process easy.
We consider this refund request resolved. If you need further assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and that your refund was processed successfully.
Yes, I received the label and returned the jacket yesterday. The refund has already appeared on my card. Thanks again!
We are closing this case as your refund was completed successfully. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
